formula: Branch B (+1,-1): Piecewise closed-form solution with switch logic. V(t) = V(0)=6.893640 for t<0; V(t) = T(σ^prev)/(1-β) + [V_B(t*) - T(σ^prev)/(1-β)]exp(λ(σ^prev)(t-t*)) for 0≤t≤t*; V(t) = c₀/(1-β) + (a_B c₁)/(1-β)²[1-exp(λ_B(t-1))] + (c₁/(1-β))t for t*≤t≤1; V(t) = V(1)=7.600000 for t>1. Where: c₀=p¹¹τ¹¹+p¹⁰τ¹⁰=0.600000, c₁=p⁰¹τ⁰¹=0.160000, a_B=βα[(p¹¹+p⁰⁰)+p¹⁰-p⁰¹]=0.027000, λ_B=(1-β)/(βα[(p¹¹+p⁰⁰)+p¹⁰-p⁰¹])=3.703704, T((+1, 0))=0.680000, λ((+1, 0))=2.777778, σ^prev=(+1, 0), t*=0.571586, V_B(t*)=7.258153.
